summary: I RECENTLY PURCHASED A 1996 HONDA CIVIC WITH A MANUAL TRANSMISSION.  THE CRUISE CONTROL WORKS ONLY INTERMITTENTLY, AND USUALLY IT DOES NOT WORK.  AT TIMES WHEN GOING OVER 40 MPH ON THE RARE OCCASION THAT I HAVE GOTTEN THE CRUISE CONTROL TO WORK, IT JUST CLICKS OFF BY ITSELF.  I AM DISABLED AND MUST HAVE CRUISE CONTROL WHEN DRIVING FOR ANY SIGNIFICANT PERIOD OF TIME.  I NEED TO KNOW IF THERE IS A FIX FOR THIS.  *JB
